root.name: F.E.A.R.: Perseus Mandate
root.description: OverviewgameplayReleased in 2007, F.E.A.R. : Perseus Mandate is the second expansion to the 2005 horror shooter, F.E.A.R. While being an expansion pack the game can also be played standalone without the need for the original title. Perseus mandate was developed by TimeGate Studios, the same developers responsible for the first expansion pack, Extraction Point. While the original title and the first expansion focused on one main character, Perseus Mandate sees the introduction of a new protagonist which allows the events in the game to run concurrently with the events in both F.E.A.R. and Extraction Point.
